H0.text: who is sir francis bacon. Scientist

H1.text: who is sir francis bacon. Statesman

H2.text: who is sir francis bacon. Lawyer

H3.text: who is sir francis bacon. Philosopher

A4.text: Francis Bacon was an English philosopher and statesman who served as Attorney General and Lord Chancellor of England under King James I.

A5.text: Bacon argued for the importance of natural philosophy, guided by the scientific method, and his works remained influential throughout the Scientific Revolution.
